name: Ares Virus
summary: A mobile game where a zombie apocalypse broke out, you have to survive zombies and some times other survivors. The game is story based, there are quests that lead you trough the game but you still have to make or find food to survive. There also is crafting in the game, you can craft armor, weapons and some other stuff and you will have to find materials for crafting and upgrading your existing oven, fletching table...
